author: rpluem
msg: * Cleanup: Remove dead code. No functional change.

author: thorsten
msg: Further refactored the structurer and themer. Being close to 'just' one plugin for the structurer. Added new seed v2 to forrrest. Removed not needed xsls.

author: sidney
msg: Bug 4619 - Disable use of IPv6 for DNS if unable to create INET6 socket and add --ipv4 command line option to use in case there is still a problem

author: gdamour
msg: GERONIMO-1077 DeploymentException propagated to deployer are incomplete
GERONIMO-1072 Better error for bad EJB QL
Propagate stack and nested exceptions to deployer. To some extent,

author: fgiust
msg: MNG-1216 CimReport.getBundle throws exception when locale doesn't have bundle
renamed the english resource bundle from project-info-report_en.properties to project-info-report.properties, so it's always used as the default when a bundle for the current locale is missing
